txt.en: 'Greetings [placeholder]. The apothecaries of Zikrum-dûl are converting poison they gather from usan-kûni. You need to travel there and destroy their workstations and defeat their leader, Samûku.'
You have successfully eliminated Samûku and the apothecaries as well as destroyed their workstations. Return with the scout to Ashâmi with this report.
There is no twist in this mission.
Your mission is to travel to Zikrum-dûl to defeat the apothecaries and their leader as well as destroy their workstations.
'[placeholder], your task is to travel to Zikrum-dûl to defeat the apothecaries and their leader Samûku, as well as destroy their workstations.'
'Good to see you [placeholder]. I have heard of your success in Zikrum-dûl. Urash Dâr will be safer with those apothecaries no longer crafting their poisons.
Your mission is to travel to Zikrum-dûl to defeat the apothecaries and their leader, as well as destroy their workstations.\n\nSpeak to Ashâmi to travel.
